description: The contract is sought to purchase the following products: *Safety signs *Outdoor furniture *Outdoor tables or picnic tables *Outdoor benches *Flower stands
full_summary:
Here is a rewritten version of the original text.

### Tender Announcement: WS4388687696
#### Project Title: Provision of Outdoor Building Materials and Prefabricated Seating Equipment

**Tender Number:** WS4388687696
**Publications Date:** January 10, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2024

**Procurement Category:** Small Goods
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Description:** The Department of National Defence, 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick, seeks offers from qualified vendors to provide outdoor building materials, outdoor tables or picnic tables, outdoor benches, flower stands, and safety signs. The equipment or materials must be received not later than March 31, 2024.

**Limitations:**
- This tender request may only be responded to by Canadian Businesses.
- The request is limited to procurement of Canadian goods.

**Regions of Delivery:**
- The provision of these goods must be delivered to the Department of National Defence, 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick, Canada.

**Solicitation Information:**
- Contact Information:
  + Name: Maryse Cyr
  + E-mail: [maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Notice URL:
  [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18475833?extsite=MTg0NzU4MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18475833?extsite=MTg0NzU4MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
- Contact Information Line is not available.

**References:**
* UNSPC Codes:
  55121704 - Safety signs
  56101600 - Outdoor furniture
  56101603 - Outdoor tables or picnic tables
  56101605 - Outdoor benches
  56101606 - Flower stands
- Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN):
  None


I removed all the unnecessary and redundant information, improved the clarity and readability of the original text, and reduced it all within the 400-word limit. Note that I also formatted the text using markdown where possible. Let me know if you need any additional edits or if
